editorialNotes.standard: Enter a world of word puzzles in MAG Interactive’s endearing follow-up to its popular multiplayer game Ruzzle. Designed as a single-player experience, Ruzzle Adventure’s hundreds of glee-inducing levels dare you to crush stone letters, escape an overflowing well and more—all by crafting words in a limited amount of time or turns. Can you top the leaderboards and outscore your friends? With this sequel’s gorgeous presentation and challenging gameplay, you’ll want to stick around to find out.

name: Clash of Richers 3 （城市富翁3）
artistName: Xiamen Jiju Network Science and Technology Co. Ltd.
